title: Filmlist
description: FIlmlist is web app for discovering new films based on what you have already seen and enjoyed. A watchlist can be created to track films you’d to see; once watched, films can be ‘liked’ and rated out of 5 stars. You can view my watchlist and seen as an example.

title: Pace
description: Pace is an app which makes getting involved in the beautiful game fast and simple. It is created for players of all levels to find and organise games of small sided football and to track their statistics. The app only exists as a set of designs for now – a live prototype was made with ProtoPie.

title: INFLOWSEM
description: INFLOWSEM (Industry Flow Solutions and Energy Management) are a part of the University of Huddersfield’s Energy Emissions and Environment Research Group and required an all-new website to increase their visibility and to more easily advertise their services to new industries.

title: TRYP
description: Tryp is a concept for an online company that allows travellers to find and book entire holiday experiences at the click of a button, saving time and money. Their brand identity and web designs were created to facilitate this new service.
